app_store_metadata.title: Venus One: Astrology & Tarot

app_store_metadata.promotional_text: Your personal astrologer, always with you. Get daily insights tailored to your unique birth chart.
app_store_metadata.description:
Discover the cosmic guidance you've been looking for. Venus One combines ancient astrological wisdom with modern AI to deliver personalized insights about your life, relationships, and destiny.

üåü DAILY HOROSCOPES
